Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

He fires the plasma rifle 8 times in the general direction of Panthos 
(gen=
eral direction to compensat for where he thinks he'll probably 
dodge to,l =
but close enough to pose a serious risk if he stands 
still).

{Panthos}

 =
   The panther almost smiled his movements agile as he dodged about half th=
e shots, accepting the remaining four on his flank. His mocking chuckle as =
he took his seat once more shifting himself a bit to ignore the scorch mark=
s on his beast forms rump.

    "Yes I imagine you do have quite a bit to a=
tone for. Attacking first against an opponent who hasn't even drawn a weapo=
n yet." His chuckle became louder, "Mayhaps you best shed this silly notion=
 of atoning yourself for having to kill your kin. You're no more maximal th=
an I am."

    "Now put away that weapon. In your current frame of mind you=
're lucky you could hit the broad side of cybertron. Now that I'm prepared =
for your tantrums you'll be just wasting energy attempting to hit me." His =
eyes locked on Turtails and gave an almost feline shrug. "Think about it. I=
f I wanted to scrap you I'd have done it while you were in your self absorb=
ed ranting."

    "Besides I know where a base belonging to your faction is=
 located in these parts already. If you're sure you want to go ahead and ki=
ll your brother for making a choice, I'm sure they might provide you with a=
ssistance. And rather than scan for it yourself I can guide you. A deal you=
 might say, information in exchange for spending my first day on this dirt =
ball without someone continually scorching my hide. Agreeable?"

    The pa=
nther waited watching the maximal cautiously ready to spring out of the way=
.
